      • isEngineWorkable

        public int isEngineWorkable()
        Check Engine Workable SUCCESS, FAIL_INTERNET_UNAVAILABLE, FAIL_WIFI_SCAN_UNAVAILABLE
        Returns:
        int PlengiResponse.Result

      • refreshPlace

        public int refreshPlace()
        Update Wifi scan and Get Place Info.
        Returns:
        Current Place Info: PlengiResponse.Place

      • setListener

        public void setListener(PlengiListener plengiListener)
        Set Plengi Listener. Many of Plengi APIs return their results through PlengiListener
        Parameters:
        plengiListener - the index of the desired character.

      • setScanPeriod

        public void setScanPeriod(int movePeriodInMillis,
                 int stayPeriodInMillis)
        Set WiFi Scan Periods.
        Parameters:
        movePeriodInMillis - scan period while moving - Default: 3 * 60 * 1000 (in milliseconds)
        stayPeriodInMillis - scan period while staying - Default: 6 * 60 * 1000 (in milliseconds)

      • start

        public int start()
        Start Plece Monitoring in background.
        Returns:
        result code (PlengiResponse.Result)

      • startNearbySession

        public int startNearbySession()
        Start NearbyDevice Session. After calling this function, this device is shown to nearbys and can see nearbys.
        Returns:
        result of performing the function: PlengiResponse.Result

      • stop

        public int stop()
        Stop Plece Monitoring in background.
        Returns:
        result code (PlengiResponse.Result)

      • stopNearbySession

        public int stopNearbySession()
        Stop NearbyDevice Session. After calling this function, this device is not shown to nearbys and cannot see nearbys.
        Returns:
        result of performing the function: PlengiResponse.Result
